narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  This was a focused inspection to ensure the direct
non-compliant items (2.40 b 4--training regarding tranquilization and 3.80 a 2 iii--enclosures must contain animals
securely) identified during the last inspection (8 May 2014) were addressed.   
 
The focused inspection and an exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
